name: clipnest
description: Temporary image clipboard and simple task manager for Windows.
author: yamag

scripts.dev:electron: wait-on tcp:5173 && npm run build:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 electron .
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');for (const d of ['dist-renderer','dist-electron','release']) { try { fs.rmSync(d,{recursive:true,force:true,maxRetries:5,retryDelay:100}); } catch {} }"
scripts.prune:update-metadata: node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');for (const p of ['release/latest.yml','release/win-unpacked/resources/app-update.yml']) { try { fs.rmSync(p,{force:true}); } catch {} }"
scripts.build: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:electron
scripts.dist:win: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis --publish never && npm run prune:update-metadata
